title: Not Even A Real Links Post, Just A Link
summary:
Key ideas
- The author previously wrote about utopian science in a blog post
- The author considers the post to be hasty and poorly thought out 
- The post did motivate Robin Hanson to explain his ideas on academic prediction markets 

Key learnings
- Acknowledging when a post is poorly thought out can lead to productive discussions 
- Even if a post is not perfect, it can still lead to positive outcomes 

Key questions
- How can the author avoid writing hasty and poorly thought out blog posts in the future? 
- What other topics could the author write about to generate productive discussions?
